content.html:
Peripherals
and
Optional
Accessories

11

Lenses

Power Zoom Lenses

Adjusting zoom while the lens is wet makes it easier for water to find
its way inside the lens. Wipe any water from the lens before adjusting
zoom.


Zoom can be adjusted on power zoom lenses using the zoom/
focus control ring, zoom button, or zoom ring.

A XF18-120mmF4 LM PZ WR lens is used here for illustrative purposes.


ControlDescription
Zoom ringRotate the zoom ring to zoom in or out manually.
2 Zoom/focus control ringRotate the zoom/focus control ring to zoom in or out using powered zoom. The zoom speed is proportional to the speed with which the ring is rotated.
Z/F (zoom/focus) buttonSwitch the role of zoom/focus control ring from focus to zoom or vice versa.
Zoom buttonsPress a zoom button to zoom in or out at a steady speed using powered zoom. Zoom ends when the button is pressed a second time.

The Z/F and zoom buttons can be assigned other roles using
BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > POWER ZOOM LENS FUNCTION (Fn)
SETTING.
● The speed at which zoom can be adjusted via the zoom buttons can
be chosen using 8 BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > LENS ZOOM/FOCUS
SETTING.

340
content.markdown:
Peripherals
and
Optional
Accessories

11

Lenses

Power Zoom Lenses

Adjusting zoom while the lens is wet makes it easier for water to find
its way inside the lens. Wipe any water from the lens before adjusting
zoom.

Zoom can be adjusted on power zoom lenses using the zoom/
focus control ring, zoom button, or zoom ring.

A XF18-120mmF4 LM PZ WR lens is used here for illustrative purposes.

![image](/image/placeholder)


| Control | Description |
| --- | --- |
| Zoom ring | Rotate the zoom ring to zoom in or out manually. |
| 2 Zoom/focus control ring | Rotate the zoom/focus control ring to zoom in or out using powered zoom. The zoom speed is proportional to the speed with which the ring is rotated. |
| Z/F (zoom/focus) button | Switch the role of zoom/focus control ring from focus to zoom or vice versa. |
| Zoom buttons | Press a zoom button to zoom in or out at a steady speed using powered zoom. Zoom ends when the button is pressed a second time. |


- The Z/F and zoom buttons can be assigned other roles using
- BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > POWER ZOOM LENS FUNCTION (Fn)
- SETTING.
- ● The speed at which zoom can be adjusted via the zoom buttons can
- be chosen using 8 BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > LENS ZOOM/FOCUS
- SETTING.
